my man typing a whole fcking essay

I see many people say stuff like “why does this artist waste talent on NTR trash”, and to that I say, it is popular. The whole reason why NTR is so prominent is mainly because so many people support it over vanilla or whatnot. You guys have to remember that hentai has limitless opportunities and creative freedom, so people obviously want stuff off the deep end. For why NTR is so insanely popular, is because most NTR have weak stories, so it is much easier to focus on sex. Another reason as to why I think it is more popular than many other categories, is that many people want a compromise. A lot of hentai that go off the deep end is pretty fucked up and many people don’t like that, nor do they like vanilla. Think of it like spicy food, lots of people like spicy food because of that little bit of spice that shakes things up in food, but they don’t want to extremely spicy food that makes the food unbearable to eat.
